a.n: Liz McComb in Paris: Back to Blues

p.k: Liz McComb in Paris: Back to Blues 1998. Liz McComb. Olympia, Paris, France
p.d: This film is a souvenir of an extraordinary concert. It reveals the true personality of Liz Mc Comb: more than a great gospel singer, she is a lover who dreams of sharing her generosity with us. Liz Mc Comb sings, among others, 'I'm Just a Poor Wayfaring Stranger' for all the immigrants in the world, followed by her famous 'Time Is Now'.
